data.question: What are porous coordination polymers (PCPs) potentially used for?
What makes unsaturated metal centers (UMCs) attractive for incorporation into PCPs?
data.answer: UMCs can strongly interact with guest molecules.

data.question: Why is low-coordinate silver(I) considered a potential UMC?
data.answer: Because silver(I) centers can adopt diverse coordination environments and have a high affinity for unsaturated hydrocarbon molecules.

data.question: What is the coordination topology of the [Ag2(Me4bpz)] framework?
What is the maximum temperature at which the host framework of [Ag2(Me4bpz)] remains stable?
What type of adsorption profile indicates the presence of uniform micropores in a material?
What happens to the [Ag2(Me4bpz)] framework upon heating in a nitrogen flow?
data.answer: The guest-free single-crystal [Ag2(Me4bpz)] can be obtained.

data.question: How does the [Ag2(Me4bpz)] framework respond to the inclusion of large guest molecules?
data.answer: It undergoes structural transformation to accommodate the guest molecules.

data.question: What is the effect of adsorbing benzene and toluene on the [Ag2(Me4bpz)] framework?
data.answer: It leads to a new crystal phase, 2·g, with decreased symmetry and a variety of cavity shapes and sizes.

data.question: What type of interactions primarily stabilize the guest molecules in the 2·g phase?
data.answer: Ag···π interactions for monomers and dimers, and C-H···Ag interactions for trimers.

data.question: Can phase 1 of [Ag2(Me4bpz)] be recovered after adsorbing guest molecules?
data.answer: Yes, by heating the single crystal of 2·b and 2·t at 90–110 8C.

data.question: Is the [Ag2(Me4bpz)] framework considered to have high thermal stability?
Do the guest molecules in 1·g can be completely removed below 120 8C?
Is the [Ag2(Me4bpz)] framework inflexible and unable to accommodate large guest molecules?
Are the cavities in 2·g uniform in shape and size?
Does the [Ag2(Me4bpz)] framework exhibit permanent porosity?
Are Ag···π interactions weaker than π···π interactions between arene guest molecules in 2·g?
Is the [Ag2(Me4bpz)] framework's flexibility unique among PCPs?
